content: mmaammaa && bbaabbyy ssnnaakkee @ifnanknitya this pattern is for personal use only this pattern is the property of ifnanknitya you may not alter copy sell or redistribute this pattern or any part of it you can sell any finished plushies made from this pattern please tag me @ifnanknitya so i can see your finished plushies if you have any questions feel free to message me @ifnanknitya abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring st - stitch single_crochet - single_crochet chain - chain increase - increase decrease - invisible decrease flo - front loop only blo - back loop only - number of stitches in the round - repeating stitches materials weight 4 yarn i used loops and threads petite purl safety eye recommendations 3 5mm hook baby snake - 7mm scissors mama snake - 12mm stuffing needle @ifnanknitya baby snake chain 4 1 starting in 2nd chain from the hook 2sc 3sc in last stitch single_crochet increase 8 2 single_crochet around 8 3 *increase* x3 5sc 11 4 single_crochet increase 2sc increase 6sc 13 5 single_crochet around 13 6 3sc decrease 8sc 12 if using safety eyes install between round 4- 5 5 stitches showing between 7 *decrease* x4 4sc 8 stuff the head continue to stuff the body as you go 8-37 single_crochet around 8 30 rounds 38 decrease 6sc 7 39 single_crochet around 7 40 decrease 5sc 6 41 single_crochet around 6 42 decrease 4sc 5 43 decrease 3sc 4 fasten_off and leave a long tail to close the hole embroidered eyes safety eyes @ifnanknitya egg leave a long tail from the magic_ring this will be used to tie the inside when closing the egg when creating the egg we start with the pouch this will be tucked inside after round 19 1 magic_ring 6 6 20 *3sc increase* x10 50 2 *increase* x6 12 21-28 single_crochet around 50 8 rounds 3 *single_crochet increase* x6 18 29 *23sc decrease* x2 48 4 single_crochet increase *2sc increase* x5 single_crochet 30-33 single_crochet around 48 4 rounds 24 34 3sc decrease *6sc decrease* x5 5 *3sc increase* x6 30 3sc 42 6 flo single_crochet around 30 35 single_crochet around 42 7-18 single_crochet around 30 12 rounds start stuffing around the pouch 19 blo single_crochet increase *2sc increase* x9 single_crochet 40 round 20 keep the magic_ring coil the snake round 35 string above the in the pouch stuffing before stuffing @ifnanknitya egg 36 *5sc decrease* x6 36 37 single_crochet around 36 38 2sc decrease *4sc decrease* x5 2sc 30 39 single_crochet around 30 40 *3sc decrease* x6 24 stuff some more keeping the magic_ring string above the stuffing continue stuffing as you go round 40 41 single_crochet decrease *2sc decrease* x5 single_crochet 18 42 *single_crochet decrease* x6 12 43 decrease x6 6 fasten_off and leave a long tail to close the hole closing the egg after weaving around and closing the hole tie the two strings together weave in ends round 43 @ifnanknitya mama snake chain 5 12-121 single_crochet around 15 110 rounds 1 starting
